cgcloud__Job_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Job_Template__c
cgcloud__Job_Template__c.description: Stores whether a job is to be considered as either a task, a question, a product related question (survey), or any other object related job like capturing orders.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Reference to the description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Product_Reference__c.description: Controls whether the survey is about products. If there's no product reference, then the dynamic must be true.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Describes the sales org to which the job template belongs.
